about: Experienced professional with a robust software development background, encompassing 5 years as an iOS developer and 1 year as a Python developer,  I possess a comprehensive understanding of mobile app development, user experience design, and software architecture. My skills include crafting clean and maintainable code, seamlessly integrating third-party libraries and APIs, and optimizing app performance. Proficient in Swift, Xcode, and Git, I bring a wealth of expertise to projects. Additionally, I have ventured into Python development, gaining proficiency in image processing through libraries such as NumPy, OpenCV, and TensorFlow. This expands my capabilities to include valuable experience in Python-based image processing within the scope of my professional background.
